name: Candy Pop Shot
description:
This is a puzzle game that is inspired by Zuma and bust-a-move.
This game has a very simple art style but the game play is what will keep you going.
You take the role of Sugar a baker in a factory full of sweets over flowing and its up to Sugar to use the Candy shooter to launch and break down the candy before they reach the end.

Unlike most match 3 puzzle games this one you can freely move around in the center of the screen.
